title: Oil India Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Authorised Medical Attendant Posts
description: Oil India Limited (Oil India) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Authorised Medical Attendant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, MBBS, and Post-graduation can apply for the Oil India Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selectio...
